abstract.text: Writes a document placeholder with the provided metadata.

inlineContent.text: The placeholder URL for the document. You can generate a placeholder URL from a document URL by calling
Call this method whenever you need to create a placeholder for a document. The metadata that you provide sets the data provided to the user in the browser interface.
While this method is available on macOS 11+, you don’t need to use it when creating a file provider extension that adopts the
